headline: The 5 Most Interesting Analyst Questions From FedEx’s Q4 Earnings Call
summary: FedEx’s fourth quarter was marked by solid execution amid a complex environment, as the company surpassed Wall Street’s revenue and profit expectations. Management attributed the performance to strength in U.S. domestic package services, continued progress in cost reductions, and resilience in B2B segments. CEO Raj Subramaniam credited the company’s ability to “mitigate the operational and financial impacts of the MD-11 groundings” and emphasized that almost half of revenue growth came from B2B
